author: Jacob Dressler
description:
Netflix tends to be very picky about what shows it renews or cancels, but in an exciting announcement, it looks like Netflix will be saving a beloved series instead. This particular show, one that’s been a popular property for years, recently lost its home at HBO Max. Now Netflix will be offering an alternate home [...]

The post Netflix Saves Beloved Series From Being Canceled appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Netflix Saves Beloved Series From Being Canceled
